scripts.preinstall: node -e "if (!process.env.npm_execpath.includes('yarn')) { console.error('⚠️ Please use Yarn as the package manager for this project.'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.predev: node -e "if (!process.env.npm_execpath.includes('yarn')) { console.error('⚠️ Please use Yarn as the package manager for this project.'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.prebuild: node -e "if (!process.env.npm_execpath.includes('yarn')) { console.error('⚠️ Please use Yarn as the package manager for this project.'); process.exit(1); }"
